data.message: Hi My daughter Hinatea is turning 6 very soon. For her  birthday, I'd like to do something very special and I have a little favor to ask. I would be absolutely delighted if you could send her a little birthday card. I am hoping to flood our mailbox with cards from everywhere around the world. If you'd like to help, please PM me and I will give you my home adress. Do not hesitate to share this message and spread the word. If this message does not please you, feel free to ignore it. Many thanks."
